text: Lawrence Pressman (born David M. Pressman; July 10, 1939) is an American actor. He is best known for roles on Doogie Howser, M.D., Ladies' Man, Profiler, Mulligan's Stew and in the 1971 movie The Hellstrom Chronicle.LAWRENCE PRESSMAN BIOGRAPHY at People Pill ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Kentucky
title: Lawrence Pressman
